//reboot_timeout: time before reboot to cycle mode in minutes, permitted range [5-45]
//cycle_period range: cycle period in minutes, permitted values [5, 10, 15, 20, 30]
//start_time: Hour of the day at which recording is started, permitted range [0001-1200]
//night_time: Hour of the day at which recording is stopped, permitted range [1201-2400]
//IR_mode: IR night mode enable to record during night time, permitted values [ON, OFF]
//cycle_period_IR range: cycle period in minutes, permitted values [5, 10, 15, 20, 30]
